properties.title: Sunrise Ridge
properties.description: Build your dream island estate on 1.28 acres with breathtaking views of Mount Scenery and neighboring isles. This pristine parcel offers the perfect canvas for your Caribbean sanctuary, with utilities available and road access. Wake up to stunning sunrises over the Caribbean Sea and enjoy the peaceful serenity that only Saba can offer.

properties.title: Rainbow Cottage
properties.description: A historic 1900 Saban gem nestled in Windwardside with charming character and sweeping sea views. This lovingly maintained cottage features traditional Saban architecture with white wooden walls, green shutters, and a classic red roof. Enjoy morning coffee on the balcony while watching the clouds drift around Mount Scenery.

properties.title: Mount Scenery Villa
properties.description: Modern luxury meets Caribbean charm in this stunning villa with panoramic views of Mount Scenery and the Caribbean Sea. Features an open floor plan, gourmet kitchen, infinity pool, and lush tropical gardens. Perfect for those seeking a turnkey island retreat with all the modern amenities.

properties.title: The Bottom Cottage
properties.description: Charming traditional Saban cottage in the historic capital village of The Bottom. This cozy home has been thoughtfully updated while preserving its authentic character. Walking distance to government offices, shops, and restaurants.

properties.title: Cove Bay Oceanfront Lot
properties.description: Rare oceanfront building lot in desirable Cove Bay with direct views of the Caribbean Sea and the island of St. Eustatius. This 0.75-acre parcel is one of the few remaining oceanfront lots available on Saba. Perfect for a luxury villa or vacation rental investment.

properties.title: Hell's Gate Estate
properties.description: Magnificent estate property in the quiet village of Hell's Gate, offering unparalleled privacy and spectacular 360-degree views. This grand home features a main residence plus a separate guest cottage, swimming pool, and over 2 acres of landscaped grounds.

rentals.title: Oceanview Retreat
rentals.description: Experience the magic of Saba from this stunning vacation villa perched on the hillside in Windwardside. Floor-to-ceiling windows frame breathtaking views of the Caribbean Sea. Features a fully equipped kitchen, outdoor dining area, and private pool.

rentals.title: Saban Cottage Escape
rentals.description: Cozy and authentic Saban cottage in the heart of Windwardside village. Walk to restaurants, shops, and hiking trails. This charming home offers the perfect base for exploring all that Saba has to offer.

rentals.title: Cloud Forest Hideaway
rentals.description: Romantic getaway nestled in Saba's famous cloud forest near the Mount Scenery trail. Wake up surrounded by lush tropical vegetation and exotic birds. Perfect for nature lovers and hikers seeking a peaceful retreat.

rentals.title: Sunset Villa
rentals.description: Luxury family villa with spectacular sunset views from Booby Hill. Spacious living areas, gourmet kitchen, infinity pool, and multiple terraces make this the ultimate Saba vacation experience. Perfect for families or groups of friends.
